entry.title: Humble-local-cache -- I
entry.content:
This is only a research project and isn’t used in any production environment for now. I would like to share some thoughts for designing and limitation for this cache.

Git directory: git.

Origin

Well, this series of articles were supposed to simple and clear to understand. So maybe one day my daughter can read it, learning something about programming and survive the ‘Matrix’ or maybe ‘OmegoGo’ in the future. Well this topic is a little heavy. Let’s come back and be humble. :)

Why local cache

There are many open source cache projects these days. Actually, there are too many of them.

–to be continue–
